name: Icewind S-DEM Pod
tags: support12, emp7, missile16, persean, merc, rare_bp, damage_special, damage_soft_flux
customPrimary:
Each missile comes equipped with a personal shield generator with decent capacity. 

Fires a high powered ion-beam when near its target, lasting for eleven seconds and dealing 4000 EMP and 300 energy damage a second.

The beam barrages the target with EMP arcs, each carrying a small portion of the main beam's EMP damage. Each arc has a low chance to pierce shields, scaling with the target's hard flux level.
customPrimaryHL: eleven seconds | 4000 EMP | 300 energy | small portion | EMP damage | hard flux
